summary: Leona is a standalone follower, based on my racemenu preset. (unpcm/cbbe curvy)
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][b][/b][/size][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/12445/?][size=5][b]SSE Version portet by [/b][/size][size=5][b]bchick3[/b][/size][/url]

[img]http://fs5.directupload.net/images/170603/fn8rjb6l.jpg[/img][/center][center][/center]

[size=5][center]Standalone Follower Leona
[size=3]unpcm/cbbe curvy[/size][/center]
[/size]Hi, this is my first follower mod, so i hope it works. ;)

[size=3]Follower detail:[/size]

Name : Leona
Age: 24
Race : Nord
Level : 6 - 150
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=2]Protection: Essential[/size][/font]
Voice : Female Young Eager
Body : unpcm/cbbe curvy
Weight : 100
Armor : Leather armor.  (If you have problems to give her a armor, please download under Optional files the file without the default armor.)
Weapon: Akaviri Katana
Class: Spellsword
Spells: Healing, IceSpike, IcySpear, LightningBolt, LightningCloak

[size=3]Location : Honningbrew Meadery[/size]

[center][img]http://fs5.directupload.net/images/170603/b4jmmg7o.jpg[/img][/center]

[size=3]Version 1.1[/size]
[size=4]---------------[/size]
german/english
[size=3]---------------[/size]
Skykix-FollowerLeona unpcm

Skykix-FollowerLeona cbbe curvy

Under [size=3]optional files[/size] you can dowload a unpcm hdt file(you need a compatible skeleton)... [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended[/url]
and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics Extensions[/url] required.

Also under [size=3]optional files[/size] you can find files for a never nude body.

For Version 1.0: If you have problems with stretched hair, or if she is sometimes invisible, please download the "Fix for the Hair" under Miscellaneous.

[size=3]Deutsche Übersetzungen unter miscellaneous.[/size]

[center][img]http://fs5.directupload.net/images/170603/ut73xbtv.jpg[/img][/center]

[size=4]----------------------------------------------------------------[/size]

If you want to change her Body, you can find her files in:

Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim\Data\meshes\actors\character\Leona\body

If you want to change her textures, you can find her files in:

Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim\Data\textures\actors\character\Leona\body
[size=4]
----------------------------------------------------------------[/size]


[size=3]Changelog:[/size]

V 1.0: Release
V 1.1: Included the fixes into the main file and uploaded optional files. ( If you have installed V 1.0 with all fixes, u dont need to download the V 1.1)


[size=4]----------------------------------------------------------------[/size]

CREDITS:

BodySlide, Outfit Studio and CBBE Body by Ousnius and Caliente
XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended - XPMSE by Groovtama
unpcm by Halofarm
RaceMenu by Expired
Fair Skin Complexion by HHaleyy
KS Hairdos - Renewal by Kalilies Stealthic Khaos and Shocky
SG Female Eyebrows by Hello Santa
The Eyes Of Beauty by Gabriel Mailhot as LogRaam

I hope i forgot nobody...

Tools:

Nifskope
Nifmerge
TES5Edit

enb: modified [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41482/?]rudy enb[/url]

thx for these great mods. :)

and thx Skylaskyrim for the tutorial to make these follower. :)

[center][/center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84244/?]Leona - Preset and Exported Head[/url][center][/center]

[center]
[center][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1020554/?tb=mods&pUp=1]My other Mods[/url][/size][/center][size=3]If you like my mods, please endorse and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/addimage/?id=84358]add some screenshots[/url].

[img]http://fs5.directupload.net/images/170813/23dhh48k.jpg[/img]

[/size]
[size=3][size=3]------[img]https://forums.nexusmods.com/public/style_emoticons/dark/cool.gif[/img]-[size=4]A BIG thanks to all who have supported my mod already[/size]-[img]https://forums.nexusmods.com/public/style_emoticons/dark/smile.gif[/img]----- [/size]

Skykix ;)[/size][/center]
